page.title: 09Leisure
page.content: Lakey Hill Golf Club with a membership of 650, is situated some 3 miles from Bere Regis in ll0 acres of beautiful Dorset countryside. From the first tee Corfe Castle is discernible on clear days. The first nine holes have mostly natural hazards of small lakes and streams where waterlilies and bullrushes abound. The second half is carved out of a rhododendron plantations which in late spring is a blaze of purple blossom. Although it is fairly flat it is an interesting course, especially for the more elderly. Hyde House provides sporting holidays for people of all ages to enjoy the challenge of learning new activities such as dinghy sailing, windsurfing canoeing, rowing, parascending, archery, shooting, fencing, Judo under careful guidance and supervision.
